feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Martha, you are young... if you meet with such a young man, and tell me, and I find he is respectable, I have no objection to his coming to see you once a week. God forbid! that I should grieve any young hearts.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Miss Matty was startled, she submitted to Fate and Love.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Miss Matty heard the news in silence; in fact, from the account of the previous day, it was only what we had to expect.

feels.name: Acceptance
feels.quote: She spoke as if she were providing for some distant contingency, and was rather startled when Martha made her ready eager answer.

Places.name: Miss Matty's drawing-room
Places.description: A small, quiet room with a little table by her bedside where she keeps a book given by Mr. Holbrook.

Events.name: Miss Matty's Decision on Martha's Relationship
